title: I Cant Level Up My Honor
body: so ive been playing league of legends for a while now and when they added this new honor system  i thought it was kinda dope. After time goes on i play with all my friends and see them getting up to level 3, 4, then 5 while i stay at the same honor level. doesnt really make sense since i get even more honor then them at times so im wondering why this is happening. Is there anything that i did before the honor system that restricts me from leveling up? or is it some type of bug...

replies.body: You can slow down if you have some less than honorable games, but progress shouldn't stop unless you've been penalized for a behavior incident.  Hit up our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more context specific to your account, otherwise keep honoring on!
